medical_history.chief_complaint: Congenital adrenal hyperplasia and steroid 11 b-hydroxylase deficiency.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient exhibited severe manifestations of congenital adrenal hyperplasia, including penile enlargement at 2 years of age, increased growth velocity, and elevated blood pressure for age. The diagnosis of 11 b-hydroxylase deficiency was confirmed at 3 years, 2 months of age. The condition has progressed with notable physical changes and indications of hormonal imbalance.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of congenital adrenal hyperplasia and 11 b-hydroxylase deficiency confirmed by hormonal studies.
medical_history.family_history: The parents were first cousins, suggesting a potential hereditary component.
